description: Italy has the third highest officially recorded coronavirus deaths, after the US and the UK.
title: Coronavirus: Italy death toll tops 30,000, highest in EU
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy death toll tops 30,000, highest in EU - BBC News
maintext: Some lockdown measures have been rolled back. This week, Italians have been able to exercise for the first time in weeks, as long as they respect rules on physical distance and wear masks where distancing is difficult. They are able to visit relatives - but not friends - within their region.
